update BUS_LOADING_NOTICE
USABLE_STATUS=#{usable_status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME=#{create_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATE_IP=#{create_ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_USER_ID=#{create_user_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_USER_NAME=#{create_user_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

DELETE_IP=#{delete_ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DELETE_FLAG=#{delete_flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DELETE_USER_ID=#{delete_user_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

ORDER_CODE=#{order_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

ATTRIBUTE2=#{attribute2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE3=#{attribute3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE4=#{attribute4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE5=#{attribute5,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ID=#{id,jdbcType=CHAR},
LADING_BILL_ID=#{ladingBillId,jdbcType=CHAR},
LADING_BILL_CODE=#{ladingBillCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
JOB_TIME=#{jobTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
DISPATCH_TIME=#{dispatchTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
LICENSE_PLATE=#{licensePlate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRODUCT_ID=#{productId,jdbcType=CHAR},
PRODUCT_NAME=#{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRODUCT_MODEL_NUMBER=#{productModelNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRODUCT_BATCH_NUMBER=#{productBatchNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRODUCT_LEVEL=#{productLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRODUCT_LEVEL_ID=#{productLevelId,jdbcType=CHAR},
NUM=#{num,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
GATE_NUM=#{gateNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
POSITION_NUM=#{positionNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TONE_NUM=#{toneNum,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
STOREMAN_ID=#{storemanId,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
STOREMAN=#{storeman,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FORKLIFT_MONITOR_ID=#{forkliftMonitorId,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
FORKLIFT_MONITOR=#{forkliftMonitor,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OPERATION_SUPERVISOR_ID=#{operationSupervisorId,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
OPERATION_SUPERVISOR=#{operationSupervisor,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS=#{status,jdbcType=CHAR},
PRINT_DATE=#{printDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
FORKLIFT_TRUCK_IS_CONFIRM=#{forkliftTruckIsConfirm,jdbcType=CHAR},
SUPERVISOR_IS_CONFIRM=#{supervisorIsConfirm,jdbcType=CHAR},
FORKLIFT_TRUCK_CONFIRM_TIME=#{forkliftTruckConfirmTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
SUPERVISOR_CONFIRM_TIME=#{supervisorConfirmTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
TRUCK_INPUT_BREAK_BAG_NUM=#{truckInputBreakBagNum,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
SUPERVISOR_INPUT_BREAK_BAG_NUM=#{supervisorInputBreakBagNum,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
ACTUAL_DELIVERY_NUMBER=#{actualDeliveryNumber,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
IS_NEED_WEIGH=#{isNeedWeigh,jdbcType=CHAR},
where ID=#{id}

for update

select BUS_LOADING_NOTICE.ID as id, BUS_LOADING_NOTICE.LADING_BILL_ID as ladingBillId, BUS_LOADING_NOTICE.LADING_BILL_CODE as ladingBillCode, BUS_LOADING_NOTICE.JOB_TIME as jobTime, BUS_LOADING_NOTICE.DISPATCH_TIME as dispatchTime, BUS_LOADING_NOTICE.LICENSE_PLATE as licensePlate, BUS_LOADING_NOTICE.PRODUCT_ID as productId, BUS_LOADING_NOTICE.PRODUCT_NAME as productName, BUS_LOADING_NOTICE.PRODUCT_MODEL_NUMBER as productModelNumber, BUS_LOADING_NOTICE.PRODUCT_BATCH_NUMBER as productBatchNumber, BUS_LOADING_NOTICE.PRODUCT_LEVEL as productLevel, BUS_LOADING_NOTICE.PRODUCT_LEVEL_ID as productLevelId, BUS_LOADING_NOTICE.NUM as num, BUS_LOADING_NOTICE.GATE_NUM as gateNum, BUS_LOADING_NOTICE.POSITION_NUM as positionNum, BUS_LOADING_NOTICE.TONE_NUM as toneNum, BUS_LOADING_NOTICE.STOREMAN_ID as storemanId, BUS_LOADING_NOTICE.STOREMAN as storeman, BUS_LOADING_NOTICE.FORKLIFT_MONITOR_ID as forkliftMonitorId, BUS_LOADING_NOTICE.FORKLIFT_MONITOR as forkliftMonitor, BUS_LOADING_NOTICE.OPERATION_SUPERVISOR_ID as operationSupervisorId, BUS_LOADING_NOTICE.OPERATION_SUPERVISOR as operationSupervisor, BUS_LOADING_NOTICE.STATUS as status, BUS_LOADING_NOTICE.PRINT_DATE as printDate, BUS_LOADING_NOTICE.FORKLIFT_TRUCK_IS_CONFIRM as forkliftTruckIsConfirm, BUS_LOADING_NOTICE.SUPERVISOR_IS_CONFIRM as supervisorIsConfirm, BUS_LOADING_NOTICE.FORKLIFT_TRUCK_CONFIRM_TIME as forkliftTruckConfirmTime, BUS_LOADING_NOTICE.SUPERVISOR_CONFIRM_TIME as supervisorConfirmTime, BUS_LOADING_NOTICE.TRUCK_INPUT_BREAK_BAG_NUM as truckInputBreakBagNum, BUS_LOADING_NOTICE.SUPERVISOR_INPUT_BREAK_BAG_NUM as supervisorInputBreakBagNum, BUS_LOADING_NOTICE.ACTUAL_DELIVERY_NUMBER as actualDeliveryNumber,
BUS_LADING_BILL.DRIVER_NAME as driverName, BUS_LADING_BILL.PHONE_NUMBER as phoneNumber,
BUS_LOADING_NOTICE.IS_NEED_WEIGH as isNeedWeigh from BUS_LOADING_NOTICE
inner join BUS_LADING_BILL on BUS_LADING_BILL.ID = BUS_LOADING_NOTICE.LADING_BILL_ID inner join BUS_VEHICLE_SAFETY_INSPECTION on BUS_VEHICLE_SAFETY_INSPECTION.LADING_BILL_ID = BUS_LADING_BILL.ID
inner join BUS_ROW_NUMBER on BUS_ROW_NUMBER.LADING_BILL_ID = BUS_LADING_BILL.ID
inner join BUS_LADING_BILL on BUS_LADING_BILL.ID = BUS_LOADING_NOTICE.LADING_BILL_ID
order by ${orderStr}

begin
update BUS_LOADING_NOTICE
USABLE_STATUS=#{item.usable_status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME=#{item.create_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATE_IP=#{item.create_ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_USER_ID=#{item.create_user_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_USER_NAME=#{item.create_user_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

MODIFY_USER_ID=#{item.modify_user_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFY_USER_NAME=#{item.modify_user_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

ORDER_CODE=#{item.order_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE1=#{item.attribute1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE2=#{item.attribute2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE3=#{item.attribute3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE4=#{item.attribute4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE5=#{item.attribute5,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ID=#{item.id,jdbcType=CHAR},
LADING_BILL_ID=#{item.ladingBillId,jdbcType=CHAR},
LADING_BILL_CODE=#{item.ladingBillCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
JOB_TIME=#{item.jobTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
DISPATCH_TIME=#{item.dispatchTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
LICENSE_PLATE=#{item.licensePlate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRODUCT_ID=#{item.productId,jdbcType=CHAR},
PRODUCT_NAME=#{item.productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRODUCT_MODEL_NUMBER=#{item.productModelNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRODUCT_BATCH_NUMBER=#{item.productBatchNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRODUCT_LEVEL=#{item.productLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRODUCT_LEVEL_ID=#{item.productLevelId,jdbcType=CHAR},
NUM=#{item.num,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
GATE_NUM=#{item.gateNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
POSITION_NUM=#{item.positionNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TONE_NUM=#{item.toneNum,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
STOREMAN_ID=#{item.storemanId,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
STOREMAN=#{item.storeman,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FORKLIFT_MONITOR_ID=#{item.forkliftMonitorId,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
FORKLIFT_MONITOR=#{item.forkliftMonitor,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OPERATION_SUPERVISOR_ID=#{item.operationSupervisorId,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
OPERATION_SUPERVISOR=#{item.operationSupervisor,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS=#{item.status,jdbcType=CHAR},
PRINT_DATE=#{item.printDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
FORKLIFT_TRUCK_IS_CONFIRM=#{item.forkliftTruckIsConfirm,jdbcType=CHAR},
SUPERVISOR_IS_CONFIRM=#{item.supervisorIsConfirm,jdbcType=CHAR},
FORKLIFT_TRUCK_CONFIRM_TIME=#{item.forkliftTruckConfirmTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
SUPERVISOR_CONFIRM_TIME=#{item.supervisorConfirmTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
TRUCK_INPUT_BREAK_BAG_NUM=#{item.truckInputBreakBagNum,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
SUPERVISOR_INPUT_BREAK_BAG_NUM=#{item.supervisorInputBreakBagNum,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
ACTUAL_DELIVERY_NUMBER=#{item.actualDeliveryNumber,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
IS_NEED_WEIGH=#{item.isNeedWeigh,jdbcType=CHAR},
where ID=#{item.id}
;end;
